sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios"
import { useCookies } from "react-cookie"

const HandlerUpdateProfileImg = async (img, userId) => {
    const 
    [cookie, setCookie] = useCookies(['user']),
    verifyExistImg = img || false,
    updateImgProfile = await (await axios.put(`${process.env.API_PATH}/v1/user/profile-photo/${userId}`, img)).data

    return updateImgProfile
}

export default HandlerUpdateProfileImg
